Package ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthorEdit.OnCreatedCallback  
    IFragmentSelected  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorEdit
    View containing three fragments/tabs: - AuthorEdit_Preview - AuthorEdit_Overview - AuthorEdit_Edit
    AuthorEdit_Edit
    Fragment controlled by AuthorEdit view Contains editing fields for a custom FragmentView
    AuthorEdit_Overview
    Fragment owned by the AuthorEdit view Shows a dynamically-created tree representing the nodes of the current story.
    AuthorStories
    View containing list of stories created by the author
    AuthorStoryDescription
    View containing description of story create by author.
    AuthorViewPager  
    BrowseFragment
    Fragment owned by BrowseView.
    BrowseView
    Contains three fragments/tabs where user can see list of cached stories, authored stories, and online stories.
    CommentsView
    Shows comments available for stories & storfragments.
    ContinueView
    View holding list of bookmarks.
    FragmentView
    View Accessed via MainView > Continue > ~Select Item~ or via MainView > BrowseView > StoryDescription > ~Play / Continue item ~

    Holds Horizontal filmstrip containing illustrations at top of page, story fragment text in the view, and an actions buttons at the bottom of the page.
    FragmentViewActivity
    View Accessed via MainView > Continue > ~Select Item~ or via MainView > BrowseView > StoryDescription > ~Play / Continue item ~

    Holds Horizontal filmstrip containing illustrations at top of page, story fragment text in the view, and an actions buttons at the bottom of the page.
    FullScreen_Image
    View accessed by clicking image in filmstrip.
    FullScreen_Image.IllustrationFragment  
    MainView
    The first and main activity of the application.
    StoryDescription
    Show synopsis & more details about selected story.
